rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with traditional Chettinad architectural elements including decorative columns and motifs. Integrated with a small waiting area and servant's quarters access.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living room designed as the primary gathering space. Features traditional chandeliers, wooden detailing inspired by Chettinad style, with a view of the courtyard to enhance natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent dining area complementing the living room. Incorporates traditional seating arrangements and locally sourced materials.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional kitchen integrated with a pantry. Designed for functionality while preserving Chettinad aesthetics with tiled backsplash and carved wooden counters.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact servant quarters located near the entrance. Provides essential living space including a small kitchenette and bathroom.

openings.description: Grand entrance door with traditional Chettinad detailing.
Large windows allowing ample natural light and airflow, following Vastu guidelines for east/west openings.
Small balcony providing ventilation and a view of the garden, adhering to local norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a private balcony. Designed using traditional motifs, ensuring privacy and Vastu compliance for the head of the family.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed with built-in wardrobes and ample natural light. Follows traditional design principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Balanced bedroom space ensuring privacy for the family members while maintaining an open feel with Chettinad style accents.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: General bathroom serving multiple rooms. Equipped with modern fixtures yet retaining a traditional aesthetic through stone finishes and carved details.

openings.description: Provides privacy, ventilation, and a view of the garden.
Windows ensuring ample natural light while adhering to Vastu principles for directional openings.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: Dedicated study/work area with natural lighting and traditional wooden finishes. Positioned to ensure a calm environment away from common areas.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom equipped with essential amenities while maintaining the Chettinad style. Ideal for occasional visitors or family guests.

rooms.name: Extra Storage / Utility Room
rooms.description: Multipurpose room used for storage and household utilities. Designed with built-in shelving and traditional motifs.

openings.description: Large window to enhance natural light, following Vastu principles for north-facing openings.
Provides access to the service area while maintaining privacy and security.
